accept.description: The accepted file types are the same as the native attributes
accept.description_zh: 接受的文件类型，与原生属性一致

capture.description: The method of obtaining the file is the same as that of the original attributes
capture.description_zh: 获取文件方式，与原生属性一致

readonly.description: Whether it is read-only or not

elevation.description: Altitude, which can be 'true', 'false' and '0-24', takes effect when not in simple mode
elevation.description_zh: 海拔高度，可选值为 `true` `false` 和 `0-24` 的等级, 不为简单模式时生效

ripple.description: Whether to turn on the water ripples

hide-list.description: Whether to hide the list of files

validate-trigger.description: When the validation is triggered, the optional value is 'onChange' onRemove
validate-trigger.description_zh: 触发验证的时机， 可选值为 `onChange` onRemove

rules.description: Validation rules, which return 'true' to indicate that the validation is passed, and the rest of the values are converted to text as user prompts
rules.description_zh: 验证规则，返回 `true` 表示验证通过，其余的值则转换为文本作为用户提示

methods.name: chooseFile
methods.description: Triggers the Select File action to display a list of files
methods.description_zh: 触发选择文件动作，显示文件列表

methods.name: closePreview
methods.description: Turn off the preview file ejection layer

methods.name: getLoading
methods.description: Gets a collection of files where 'state' equals 'loading'
methods.description_zh: 获取 `state` 等于 `loading` 的文件集合

methods.name: getSuccess
methods.description: Get a collection of files where 'state' equals 'success'
methods.description_zh: 获取 `state` 等于 `success` 的文件集合

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Get a collection of files where 'state' equals 'error'
methods.description_zh: 获取 `state` 等于 `error` 的文件集合

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Clear the bound value (set to '[]') and the validation information
methods.description_zh: 清空绑定的值(设置为 `[]`)和校验信息

VarFile.name: fit
VarFile.description: 封面图填充模式，可选值为 `fill` `contain` `cover` `none` `scale-down`

VarFile.name: state
VarFile.description: 文件上传状态，可选值为 `loading` `success` error

VarFileUtils.name: getLoading
VarFileUtils.description: 获取 `state` 等于 `loading` 的文件集合

VarFileUtils.name: getSuccess
VarFileUtils.description: 获取 `state` 等于 `success` 的文件集合

VarFileUtils.name: getError
VarFileUtils.description: 获取 `state` 等于 `error` 的文件集合

events.name: before-filter
events.description: 'before-read' to filter the list of files
events.description_zh: `before-read` 前触发，对文件列表进行过滤

events.name: before-read
events.description: Triggered before file read, returns a false value to prevent the file from being read (promises are supported)
events.description_zh: 文件读取前触发，返回假值阻止文件读取(支持 promise)

events.name: after-read
events.description: Triggered when the file is read

events.name: oversize
events.description: Triggered when the file exceeds the limit size
events.description_zh: 文件超过限制大小时触发

events.name: before-remove
events.description: Triggered before file deletion, returns a false value to prevent file deletion (promises are supported)
events.description_zh: 文件删除前触发，返回假值阻止文件删除(支持 promise)

events.name: remove
events.description: Triggered when a file is deleted
